definition: Annam (Tang Dynasty protectorate located in what is now northern Vietnam)/Annam (autonomous kingdom located in what is now northern Vietnam, 10th-15th century)/Annam (central part of Vietnam during the French colonial period)/old name for Vietnam/Annan district of Tainan City 臺南市|台南市[Tai2 nan2 shi4], Taiwan/Kofi Annan (1938-2018), UN secretary-general 1997-2006
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
South P'yong'an Province in west of North Korea
Annan district of Tainan City 臺南市|台南市[Tai2 nan2 shi4], Taiwan
old term for Truong Son Ra 長山山脈|长山山脉, mountain range forming the border between Vietnam and Laos and Kampuchea

sentences.english: Well, the people of Annam certainly don't view them as traditional.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，安南的人们当然不把他们看做传统的自己人。

sentences.english: According to Annan, that is part of what made this vote so special.
sentences.chinese: 安南说，这也是为什么这次公投如此特别的原因之一。

sentences.english: Mr. A an is meeting Friday in Bru els with European Union foreign ministers.
sentences.chinese: 安南星期五在布鲁塞尔与欧盟外长举行会谈。

sentences.english: Annan hopes that China will continue to support the UN's reconstruction work in East Timor.
sentences.chinese: 安南希望中国继续支持联合国在东帝汶的重建工作。

sentences.english: He had him replaced with a powerful ally, Mark Malloch Brown, whose overpowering presence often seemed to diminish Annan.
sentences.chinese: 布朗的强势作为常使安南相形见绌。

sentences.english: Today the Annamese are again at a cross-road.
sentences.chinese: 如今，安南又一次站在了十字路口。

sentences.english: Annan reaffirmed the One China principle.
sentences.chinese: 安南重申坚持一个中国原则。

sentences.english: Mr. Annan urged North Korean to listen and hear what the world is saying.
sentences.chinese: 安南呼吁北韩倾听国际社会的声音。

sentences.english: He hoped to obtain a passage to Annam .
sentences.chinese: 希望在那里获得到安南的通路。

sentences.english: Annan urged North Korean to listen and hear what the world is saying.
sentences.chinese: 安南呼吁北韩倾听国际社会的声音。

sentences.english: N. Secretary-General will set the stage for the discussions.
sentences.chinese: 联合国前秘书长安南将为这次讨论定下基调。

definition: used in place names, notably 瑯琊山|琅玡山[Lang2 ya2 Shan1]
Korean Goryeo dynasty, 918-1392/Korea, esp. in context of art and culture
Han Chinese name for an ancient Central Asia country
former southernmost province of the Chinese Empire, now northern Vietnam
Champa (Sanskrit: Campapura or Campanagara), ancient kingdom in the South of Vietnam c. 200-1693
